# API Reference for cdktf.LazyStringValueOptions

   LazyStringValueOptions <a name="LazyStringValueOptions" id="cdktf.LazyStringValueOptions"></a>
  
  Options for creating a lazy string token.
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.LazyStringValueOptions.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```python
  import cdktf
  
  cdktf.LazyStringValueOptions(
    display_hint: str = None
  )
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.LazyStringValueOptions.property.displayHint">display_hint</a></code> | <code>str</code> | Use the given name as a display hint. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `display_hint`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="display_hint" id="cdktf.LazyStringValueOptions.property.displayHint"></a>
  
  ```python
  display_hint: str
  ```
  
  - *Type:* str
  - *Default:* No hint
  
  Use the given name as a display hint.
